title: BYO: split
creator_credit: Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch and Eric Mival
brief_description: One of a series of films following BYO, this episode involves a discussion of whether or not to drive home after drinking at the school dance. A discussion starter for teenagers. Suitable for secondary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch and Eric Mival
